scripts.predeploy:development: firebase use development && firebase functions:config:set env.value="development"
scripts.deploy:appengine:development: gcloud app deploy app-engine.development.yaml --project <insert project id here>
scripts.predeploy:production: firebase use production && firebase functions:config:set env.value="production"
scripts.deploy:appengine:production: gcloud app deploy app-engine.production.yaml --project <insert project id here>
